hero.title: Building Digital Masterpieces that Scale.
hero.subtitle: Hi, I'm Abdulatif. I specialize in creating high-performance, accessible, and stunningly beautiful React applications.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: My name is Abdulatif. I am a Frontend Developer focused on building modern, fast, and user-friendly web applications. I specialize in JavaScript, React.js, and Tailwind CSS. I enjoy creating clean UI, smooth animations, and scalable frontend architectures.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Fill out the form and I'll get back to you.
